Pre-Game Insights: A draw with both teams scoring seems likely.
Everton's attack, led by Beto, is strong, but defensive frailties persist.
Southampton could exploit this despite their own scoring struggles.
Bulgaria have Kiril Despodov, who has 14 international goals to his name, and the Minchev brothers, both of whom have shown a knack for creating chances.
Given Belarus’s inconsistency at the back, there is a strong case to be made for Bulgaria finding the net as well.

Miscellaneous Highlights: Belarus and Bulgaria will square off at the neutral ZTE Arena in Hungary, opening their respective 2024-25 UEFA Nations League campaigns.
Both nations aim to make a strong start in League C Group 3, where they will battle with Northern Ireland and Luxembourg.
This fixture promises to be an intriguing contest.
Belarus average 0.9 goals per game from their last 10 matches, with Bulgaria matching that statistic.
Both teams have created enough big chances per game (1.5 for Belarus and Bulgaria) to suggest that finishing opportunities will present themselves.
Bulgaria’s average of 10.5 shots per game indicates they will pressure Belarus’s defence throughout the match, which in turn boosts the likelihood of both teams scoring.
Others: The best bet of both teams scoring ties in well with the prediction of a narrow 2-1 win for Bulgaria.
While both sides are expected to find the back of the net, Bulgaria’s slight edge in attacking form gives them the advantage.
Belarus have managed to keep a clean sheet only four times in their last 10 matches, their attacking unit has shown enough quality to grab at least a goal in this fixture.
Bulgaria, while vulnerable at the back, have performed solidly under Iliev’s management, remaining unbeaten in six of their last matches.
Their ability to grind out results, even if by narrow margins, suggests they may have just enough firepower to edge Belarus.
The presence of goal-scoring threats like Despodov, combined with Bulgaria’s recent resilience in drawing matches against tough opponents, points towards a 2-1 victory.
